entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
